item.title: 中国数据显示经济普遍疲软，铁矿石下跌
item.description: 由于中国的一系列负面数据显示上个月中国经济全面放缓，铁矿石下跌。【原文：Iron ore dipped as a slew of negative data from China showed a slowdown across the country’s economy last month.】

item.title: 养老基金在被指控虐待儿童后退出澳大利亚儿童保育公司
item.description: 澳大利亚养老基金 Vision Super 已剥离其在 G8 教育有限公司（G8 Education Ltd. ）中的股份，此前有指控称，该早期教育服务提供商运营的一家中心存在性虐待儿童的行为。【原文：Australian pension fund Vision Super has divested its shareholding in G8 Education Ltd. following allegations that children were sexually abused at a center run by the early learning services provider.】

item.title: 普拉博沃称赞推动增长的主要社会项目取得进展
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）在他的首次国情咨文演讲中，就他认为将推动东南亚最大经济体增长的社会计划大放厥词。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto used his first State of the Nation address to take a victory lap on the social programs he believes will drive growth in Southeast Asia’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 叙利亚移民如何推动德国经济发展
item.description:
十年前抵达的寻求庇护者中有三分之二现在有了工作。【原文：

Two-thirds of asylum-seekers who arrived a decade ago now have jobs.

】

item.title: 即使在特朗普加征关税之前，马来西亚的经济增长也不及预期
item.description: 马来西亚第二季度的经济增长低于官方预期，但央行表示，马来西亚经济足以抵御美国关税的影响。【原文：Malaysia’s growth missed official estimates in the second quarter, though the central bank said the economy is strong enough to weather the impact of US tariffs.】

item.title: 二手劳力士和百达翡丽是艰难钟表业的亮点
item.description: 二手奢侈钟表市场创下了自 2022 年初以来的最佳半年业绩，在高端钟表的严峻形势下，为市场带来了一抹亮色。【原文：The market for used luxury timepieces recorded its best half-year performance since early 2022, providing a bright spot in an otherwise grim landscape for high-end watches.】

item.title: 工党增税后伦敦失业人数最多
item.description: 在英国就业放缓的大背景下，伦敦首当其冲，因为加税、工资成本上升和消费支出疲软等因素迫使该市企业以比英国其他地区更快的速度削减工资。【原文：London is bearing the brunt of the UK’s jobs slowdown as a combination of tax rises, elevated wage costs and weak consumer spending force the city’s business to cut payrolls faster than in the rest of the country.】

item.title: 供应压力增大，中国钢铁和煤炭产量下降
item.description: 由于受到恶劣天气的影响，加上政府加大了抑制产能过剩的力度，7 月份中国的钢铁和煤炭产量出现下降。【原文：Chinese steel and coal output fell in July, as bad weather affected operations and the government’s efforts to rein in overcapacity intensified.】

item.title: 欺诈案激增后，日本经纪商寻求识别黑客
item.description: 在价值超过 40 亿美元的欺诈性交易震撼了日本股市之后，日本经纪业的目标是识别钓鱼欺诈者拥有的账户。【原文：Japan’s brokerage industry aims to identify accounts owned by phishing scammers, after fraudulent trades worth more than $4 billion rattled the nation’s stock market.】

item.title: 小米、新鹏在价格战中为中国电动车行业提供线索
item.description: Xiaomi Corp. and Xpeng Inc. are the next Chinese carmakers to report amid Beijing’s pressure to curb the industry’s long-running price war. Geely Automobile Holdings Ltd. was first out the gate on Thursday with earnings that beat expectations.

item.title: 金管局采取行动后，港元终于从疲软状态反弹
item.description: 在经历了数月的压力之后，港元兑美元汇率反弹，脱离了弱势交易区间，这是一个早期迹象，表明该市事实上的中央银行的持续干预可能正在产生效果。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar bounced to pull away from the weak end of its trading band against the dollar after months of pressure, an early sign that sustained interventions by the city’s de facto central bank may be taking effect.】

item.title: 赤泽称贝森特并未要求日本加息
item.description: 日本首席贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世说，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特并没有直接要求日本加息。【原文：Japan’s chief trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent isn’t directly asking Japan to hike interest rates, a day after Bessent moved markets by describing the Bank of Japan as being behind the curve in fighting inflation.】

item.title: 埃森哲收购澳大利亚网络安全公司 CyberCX
item.description: 埃森哲公司（Accenture Plc）将收购澳大利亚网络安全公司 CyberCX，这是该公司迄今为止在该领域最大的一笔收购，将促进亚太地区的业务发展。【原文：Accenture Plc is buying Australian cybersecurity firm CyberCX, its largest acquisition to date in the sector that will boost operations in the Asia-Pacific region.】

item.title: 中国经济大幅放缓，前景不容乐观
item.description: 中国经济在 7 月份全面放缓，工厂活动和零售销售令人失望，这表明唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战开始对世界第二大经济体造成压力。【原文：China’s economy slowed across the board in July with factory activity and retail sales disappointing, suggesting Donald Trump’s trade war is starting to weigh on the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 部长称马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas）尚未与沙捞越州敲定天然气协议
item.description: 马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd. is still discussing details of a cooperation framework with Sarawak’s oil company as part of efforts to resolve an ongoing dispute over gas resources in the state.】

item.title: 中国新房价格下跌，刺激政策未能止跌
item.description: 中国 7 月份新房价格下降速度加快，进一步表明一系列刺激措施未能重振奄奄一息的市场。【原文：China’s new-home prices fell at a faster pace in July, in a further sign that a series of stimulus measures has failed to revive the moribund market.】

item.title: 以销售肥胖症药物为目标的中国制药商在香港首次亮相即大涨
item.description: 广州因诺基因药业集团股份有限公司（Guangzhou Innogen Pharmaceutical Group Co.【原文：Guangzhou Innogen Pharmaceutical Group Co., a Chinese biotech firm looking to tap the vast domestic market for obesity drugs, surged as much as 296% in its trading debut in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 随着经济降温，新西兰出现自 2012 年以来最多公民离职现象
item.description: 在截至 6 月份的 12 个月中，新西兰的公民离境人数创下 13 年来的新高，使移民净增人数降至两年半以来的最低水平。【原文：New Zealand recorded the most citizen departures in 13 years in the 12 months through June, reducing the net gain through immigration to the lowest in more than two and a half years.】

item.title: 普拉博沃在推动遗产传承过程中与中国经济崛起的设计师合作
item.description:
印尼总统成立了主权财富基金，为其标志性项目重新分配了数十亿资金，并希望影响货币政策。投资者担心他的雄心壮志没有与现实的政策相匹配。【原文：

The Indonesian president has formed a sovereign wealth fund, reallocated billions for his signature programs and wants to influence monetary policy. Investors are concerned his ambitions aren’t matched by realistic policies.

】

item.title: 报告显示美国通胀率飙升，黄金周线收跌
item.description: 在通胀回升之后，交易员们减少了对美联储下月降息的押注，黄金因此而出现周度跌幅。【原文：Gold headed for a weekly loss, after traders pared bets on the Federal Reserve cutting rates next month following a pick-up in inflation.】

item.title: 日本经济在关税冲击下仍超预期增长
item.description: 在稳健的国内需求带动下，日本上一季度经济增长速度超过预期，这给陷入困境的首相石破茂带来了一些难得的好消息，因为他在上个月历史性的大选受挫后抵挡住了辞职的呼声。【原文：Japan’s economy expanded faster than expected last quarter led by solid domestic demand, giving embattled Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba some rare good news as he fends off calls to resign following last month’s historic election setback.】

item.title: 不温不火的一周结束后石油价格趋于平稳，关注特朗普与普京的会谈
item.description: 本日和本周石油价格持稳，投资者关注周五晚些时候美国和俄罗斯总统之间的会晤。【原文：Oil was steady for the day and the week, with investors focused on the meeting between the US and Russian presidents later on Friday.】

item.title: 秘鲁维持利率不变，决策者在评估关税损失
item.description: 秘鲁维持利率不变，因为低于目标的通胀率使政策制定者可以灵活地等待大选的不确定性和美国关税对经济增长和物价的影响。【原文：Peru kept interest rates unchanged as below-target inflation gives policymakers the flexibility to wait to see how election uncertainty and US tariffs affect growth and prices.】

item.title: 台湾自美国征税以来首次修正经济增长展望
item.description: 自特朗普政府对出口到美国的商品征收 20% 的关税以来，台湾将对其 2025 年的经济增长预期进行修订，这也是台湾对其经济表现预期的首次亮相。【原文：Taiwan is set to revise its estimate for growth in 2025, providing the first glimpse of how it expects the economy to perform since the Trump administration imposed a 20% duty on exports to the US.】

item.title: 大卫-泰珀收购被打压的联合健康，削减中国赌注
item.description: 亿万富翁大卫-泰珀（David Tepper）展示了他作为逆向投资者的风格，他在第二季度收购了陷入困境的联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：Billionaire David Tepper showcased his style as a contrarian investor, scooping up shares of beleaguered UnitedHealth Group Inc. in the second quarter while trimming stakes in Chinese stocks.】

item.title: 美国股市涨势受阻，亚洲股市开盘不温不火：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开局不温不火，此前通胀回升阻止了美国股市的涨势，并推高了债券收益率，因为交易员减少了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：Equities in Asia were set for a tepid start after a pick-up in inflation halted a rally in US stocks and lifted bond yields as traders pared bets of Federal Reserve interest-rates cuts.】

item.title: 对冲基金在持仓调整中增持微软、Netflix：13F 报告综述
item.description: 对冲基金在第二季度增持了包括微软公司和 Netflix 公司在内的科技巨头股票，这一时期的波动最初因唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策而激增，但最终以主要基准大幅上涨而告终。【原文：Hedge funds added exposure to technology giants including Microsoft Corp. and Netflix Inc. in the second quarter, a stretch that saw an initial surge in volatility due to President Donald Trump’s trade policies but ultimately ended with major benchmarks posting significant gains.】

item.title: 投资者希望从日本科技公司的现金储备中获得更多回报
item.description: 日本科技企业向股东返还更多现金的压力日益增大，这可能会刺激下一阶段的企业改革，而企业改革曾帮助推动日本股市屡创新高。【原文：Increasing pressure on Japan’s technology firms to return more cash to shareholders may spur the next phase of corporate reforms that helped drive the nation’s stock market to record highs.】

item.title: 收益超预期，Equinox 黄金期权赌注迅速获得 170% 的收益
item.description: 一名投资者周二买入了价值 600 万股的 Equinox Gold Corp. 看涨期权，在这家总部位于温哥华的矿业公司盈利超出预期后，他的资金翻了一番多，股价也创下了自 2022 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：An investor who bought 6 million shares worth of Equinox Gold Corp. call options Tuesday more than doubled their money after the Vancouver-based miner’s earnings beat estimates, sending shares soaring by the most since 2022.】

item.title: 淘金热帮助玻利维亚巩固公共财政
item.description:
中央银行通过以当地货币购买玻利维亚黄金并出售换取美元，筹集了 30 多亿美元。【原文：

El banco central ha recaudado más de US$3.000 millones comprando oro boliviano en moneda local y vendiéndolo a cambio de dólares.

】
